Description: Anthony leaving Cleopatra; Anthony in armour and carrying sword and shield leaves to right while Cleopatra seated to left caresses his shoulder as he leaves, surrounded by attendants Watercolour
Bibliographic references: Walker & Higgs 2001 / Cleopatra of Egypt: from History to Myth (377)
Acquisition notes: This item has an uncertain or incomplete provenance for the years 1933-45. The British Museum welcomes information and assistance in the investigation and clarification of the provenance of all works during that era.
